snippet: Royal Caribbean Cruises, Carnival Corporation and Norwegian Cruise Line have posted on their Web sites the number of serious crimes reported on their ships, the first public airing of such statistics.
abstract: Royal Caribbean Cruises, Carnival Corporation and Norwegian Cruise Line have posted on their Web sites the number of serious crimes reported on their ships, the first public airing of such statistics.

headline.print_headline: Trending: Cruise Lines Report Crime Statistics
